title: LF Team Member for OCE Open Ladder
body:
We are currently looking for 3 more members to join the OCE Open Ladder, role we are searching for:
Top
Jungle
Support

The current (but small) lineup is
Mid: poccky
ADC: itzExxon

I would also like to know your availabilities and your preferred role for the team. Rank does not matter and we prefer to use Skype.
Thanks.

replies.body:
My main lane is support 
My fav supports are blitz/thresh/janna
IGN-Petrusvdw
Div-s5

hey dude would love to try out for the team plz pm me my IGN:TheSeventhSon86
can play all spots plz ignore my rankings my son plays on my account (he is 6yrs lol)
have been apart of amatuer teams before and would love to do again hit me up :)

also i have curse and a ts3 client we can use privately (its my clans ts3)

Hey I am interested in trialling for your team 
I main Jungle and Top, but can also play all other roles if needed.
My summoner name is 'Dumbledore' and I also have skype.
I can play any night of the week.
{{champion:62}}

Preferable role: jg
Playable roles:jg, top
In-game name:wujugod
Available:Most weekends in the after noon or early morning Sunday.
In the jungle I mainly like to play warwick because he is so strong. I can sort of play udyr. I'm decent at Volibear. I'm a bit iffy at Yi but he's playable.
hey guys i added you in game but i main support and can play the new jungle proficiently
hey guys where r u based im nz usually play late at nights but casual employment so can arrange around it prefer support/jungle can also adc mostly play the bot lane

We are based in Australia.
I'm in the Sydney area, I'm not too sure where poccky is.

Edit: poccky is from Sydney too.

Hey guys,

I main JG and can play Top or Mid

Have Skype, summoner name Reverse Kanga

hit me up for  a game any night through the week or on weekends

I main jungle and support. I am available most evenings and Saturday mornings.

I have skype (and Curse Voice). Summoner name Sugar13.

I am keen to try out for the team.
